tssurah: import { TYPE } from '../types/islam';export const surah_99: TYPE = {ayah_1: {image: '',text: 'When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake',verse: 6008,},ayah_2: {image: '',text: 'And the earth discharges its burdens',verse: 6009,},ayah_3: {image: '',text: 'And man says, "What is [wrong] with it?" -',verse: 6010,},ayah_4: {image: '',text: 'That Day, it will report its news',verse: 6011,},ayah_5: {image: '',text: 'Because your Lord has commanded it.',verse: 6012,},ayah_6: {image: '',text: 'That Day, the people will depart separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.',verse: 6013,},ayah_7: {image: '',text: 'So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it,',verse: 6014,},ayah_8: {image: '',text: 'And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.',verse: 6015,},name: surah_99,};
